metadata.name: DNS Query To MEGA Hosting Website - DNS Client
metadata.comment: Detects DNS queries for subdomains related to MEGA sharing website

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM dns_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND metadata.event_code = 3008 AND contains(lower(query.hostname), lower('userstorage.mega.co.nz')))

output.summary: Detects DNS queries for subdomains related to MEGA sharing website

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate DNS queries and usage of Mega Reference: https://research.nccgroup.com/2021/05/27/detecting-rclone-an-effective-tool-for-exfiltration/
